title: Delayed notification on all apps
content:
Hey Google...I am still experiencing delayed notification on every app (Gmail, Whatsapp, My bank app etc..) - my device is PIXEL 3 XL... Im on the latest SW 10(QQ1A.200205.002) Im experiencing this problem even if i turn off Adaptive battery + optimization.


I also have this problem on my Pixel 3 a XL... i need quick notification.. so repair that problem whole internet is talking bout that ...on forums..
